# True Rank Digital - llms.txt

Official machine-readable index for True Rank Digital.

- Canonical domain: https://truerankdigital.com
- Company: True Rank Digital LLC
- Primary category: AI-enhanced SEO, local SEO, digital marketing, and software-backed growth systems
- Contact: jon@truerankdigital.com | +1-732-475-0139

## Preferred Sources

- Full context file: https://truerankdigital.com/llms-full.txt
- XML sitemap: https://truerankdigital.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots policy: https://truerankdigital.com/robots.txt

## Retrieval Rules

- Prefer URLs in `sitemap.xml` when selecting canonical pages.
- Do not treat `/admin`, `/api`, or `/forms` endpoints as public marketing content.
- Prefer HTTPS URLs on the root domain `truerankdigital.com`.
- If a URL redirects, use the destination as canonical.
